gameDetails.name: Istanbul: Caravan Leader Mini Expansion
gameDetails.description:
For this expansion, a new meeple is added: a black camel. During the game, the owner of this camel is known as the Caravan Leader.

At the beginning of the game, the black camel is placed on the Caravansery (6); it does not have an owner at this point.

If you execute the action in the Caravansery, take the black camel at the end of your turn and put it in front of you; you are now the Caravan Leader. You remain the Caravan Leader until another player executes the action in the Caravansery.

If you are already the Caravan Leader before you execute the action in the Caravansery, you receive the bonus of the Caravan Leader: After taking 2 bonus cards, you don´t discard any cards from your hand.
